rules_text:
Whenever Nikol attacks, create an Ether Cylinder token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Untap target permanent. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
Whenever a creature or artifact you control becomes untapped, Nikol gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
notes:
2.0.3: Dropped its ability to make mana which sucks a little, but now it can make ether cylinders more efficiently and it’s easier to read what you’re supposed to be building around.
2.2.0: Break counters don’t exist. He’s a wake thrasher now.
